comments:
Description:
1. new a datasource and dataset
2. go to the page of "Cache Preference" in the dataset editor
3. set the option and click the button "clear cache" that's ok
4. go to the system temp fold(***\Local Settings\Temp)
5. delete the fold "BirtdataCache"
6. go back to the "Cache Preference" and click the "clear cache" button again.

preview the report , it display "org.eclipse.birt.report.service.api.ReportServiceException: Error happened while running the report"

Try to recover the fold "BirtdataCache", then ervery thing is ok. So the problem may be cause by the fold lost.Add one conditional statement to check the fold existing.

This bug happens when the "BirtdataCache" has created automatically by Birt. But after its creation, user manually delete its entire foder. After that, if use has another using cache operation. It will throw NEP, since in former impl, we still think this folder does exist. Fixed this bug in source now!
